title: Kelly's Bake Shoppe
description: Vegan and gluten-free bakery opened in Dec 2012 by the owner and conscious chef & baker of Lettuce Love Cafe. Makes cakes, brownies, cookies, other vegan baked treats that's organic, soy-free, nut-free, and nutritional dense. Awarded 1st prize and best-in-show at the Toronto Vegan Bake-Off sponsored by the Toronto Vegetarian Association. Also offers coffee, coconut milk latte, and other beverages.
